definitions.definition: the remains or impression of a prehistoric organism preserved in petrified form or as a mold or cast in rock.
examples: petrified remains, petrified impression, remnant, relic we could detect fossils in the cornerstone of the building

definitions.definition: an antiquated or stubbornly unchanging person or thing.
examples: he can be a cantankerous old fossil at times

definitions.definition: a word or phrase that has become obsolete except in set phrases or forms, e.g., hue in hue and cry.
